links.title: Schedule Service
links.description: Book your executive transportation in New York

campaign.title: Travel Safely
campaign.subtitle: Verified Drivers and Trackable Vehicles
campaign.description1: The premium transfer market has grown due to increased insecurity and lack of predictability in app-based transportation.
campaign.description2: Women traveling alone represent a significant segment in international tourism and, according to research, prioritize verified drivers, tracking, and reliable 24-hour support.

differential1.title: Verified Drivers
differential1.description: All our drivers are trained, registered, and undergo background checks, ensuring your safety and peace of mind.

differential2.title: Trackable Vehicles
differential2.description: Track your journey in real-time through our app, share your location with friends or family for added security.

differential3.title: 24/7 Support
differential3.description: Immediate support for emergencies and questions at any time of day or night, ensuring assistance when you need it most.

differential4.title: Flight Monitoring
differential4.description: We monitor your flight status to avoid unexpected delays and cancellations, adjusting your transportation as needed.

targetAudience: Women between 35-54 years old traveling alone
Businesswomen and professionals on business trips
Travelers who prioritize safety and reliability

testimonial1.name: Maria R.
testimonial1.text: As a woman who travels alone frequently, safety is my priority. With AZ Transfer, I feel at ease knowing I can track the vehicle and that the drivers are verified.

testimonial2.name: Carolina S.
testimonial2.text: The 24/7 support was essential when my flight was delayed. The team adjusted my transfer immediately and kept me informed the whole time. Impeccable service!
